original_text: A person who touches that cloth will be unclean until evening. If a person picks up that cloth, he must wash his clothes. He must also wash his body. He will be unclean until evening.
korean_text: 그의 몸 아래에 닿았던 것에 접촉한 자는 다 저녁까지 부정하며 그런 것을 옮기는 자는 그의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: A person who touches that cloth
If a person picks up that cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 사람이 그 옷을 집으면

sentences.original_text: He must also wash his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 자기 몸도 씻어야 한다

sentences.original_text: He will be unclean until evening
